name: Seaside Resort
description: Seaside Resort offers a breathtaking coastal setting for your events. With a capacity of 300, it's ideal for grand celebrations. Our venue features luxury beachfront suites, perfect for a serene retreat. Boat access is available for a unique arrival experience.

name: Riverside Lodge
description: Riverside Lodge is nestled by a tranquil river, providing a rustic charm for gatherings of up to 150 guests. Cozy cabins offer comfortable accommodations, and boat access adds an element of adventure to your event.

name: Garden Pavilion
description: Garden Pavilion is a lush oasis for outdoor events. With a capacity of 200, it's perfect for garden weddings. While there's no on-site accommodation, the serene ambiance and picturesque gardens make it an excellent choice.

name: Mountain Chalet
description: Mountain Chalet offers an intimate alpine setting for up to 100 guests. Guests can enjoy stunning mountain views from the comfort of their rooms. Boat access is not available.

name: Lakefront Villa
description: Lakefront Villa is a picturesque venue with a capacity of 250, overlooking a tranquil lake. Villa suites provide a luxurious stay, and boat access adds a touch of elegance to your event.

name: Urban Loft
description: Urban Loft is a chic and modern space for gatherings of up to 120 guests. While it doesn't offer accommodations, its contemporary design and cityscape views make it a trendy choice for urban events.

name: Countryside Barn
description: Countryside Barn exudes rustic charm, accommodating up to 180 guests. Rustic barn rooms provide a cozy stay for attendees. Boat access is not available, but the countryside setting is idyllic.

name: Island Retreat
description: Island Retreat offers an exclusive island experience for events, with a spacious capacity of 400. Guests can stay in charming island cottages, and boat access makes arrival and departure a memorable part of the experience.
